page.title: 17LONGFORD RIDING CLUB
page.content: I am a member of the Longford and District Riding Club. To start the season they had a ten mile ride and an instruction rally. Later on in the season they have lots of one day events. Around October they have cross countries. On the ten mile ride I went with my sister and friends that are in the club. We went on the road to the Weaver Hills and then back by the road to the farm we started at. At shows there are about eight show jumping classes and lots of gymkhana games and sometimes five working hunter classes. In cross countries they have about 20 fences on the course. Usually it is one and a half miles and you have to walk the course the day before.
